column1: 33700,Shadowland (2010) #5,5,44261,24,"With the help of his former enemy-turned-champion, Daredevil has thwarted his former friends and finds himself prepared to claim all of New York for himself.  The chaos of Shadowland has reached a boiling point, and Daredevil himself may not survive to see the result! 32 PGS./Rated T  '$3.99",
